titleStmt.title: A newe discourse of morall philosophie, entituled, The kayes of counsaile Not so pleasant as profitable for younge courtiours. Optima est patientia victor.
titleStmt.author: Heron, Haly.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by [H. Bynneman for] Ralph Newberie,

notesStmt.note: The title has a punning reference to the dedicatee, John Kay the younger.--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
